text: wlmma shahid almuminun al'ahzab aladhin thzzabu hawl "almdyn" wahatu bha, tadhkuruu 'ana maweid alnasr qad qrb, fqalu: hdha ma waeadana allah wrswlh, min alabtla' walmhnt walnsr, fanjz allah wedh, wasadaq rasulih fima bshshar bh, wama zadahum alnazar 'iilaa al'ahzab 'iilaa 'iymanana biallah wtslymana lqdayh wanqyadana lamrh
